{"id":"q_1753504402257_0","type":"multiple_choice","question":"Facebook的Haystack存储系统主要优化了哪方面的性能？","options":"[\"磁盘读写速度\",\"内存使用效率\",\"网络传输速度\",\"元数据处理速度\"]","correctAnswer":"元数据处理速度","explanation":"根据文档，Haystack通过减少元数据操作来提高性能，因为传统方法中元数据的频繁读取是性能瓶颈。","difficulty":3,"points":10,"tags":"[]","metadata":"{\"sourceSection\":\"\",\"keywordsCovered\":\"[]\",\"estimatedTime\":60}"}

{"id":"q_1753504402257_1","type":"true_false","question":"Facebook的Haystack存储系统支持对存储的照片进行修改。","options":"[]","correctAnswer":"false","explanation":"文档中提到，Facebook的照片存储系统是写入一次、读取多次、几乎不修改、很少删除的。","difficulty":3,"points":10,"tags":"[]","metadata":"{\"sourceSection\":\"\",\"keywordsCovered\":\"[]\",\"estimatedTime\":60}"}

{"id":"q_1753504402257_2","type":"short_answer","question":"Haystack存储系统设计的主要目标是什么？","options":"[]","correctAnswer":"高吞吐量和低延迟、容错性、成本效益","explanation":"","difficulty":3,"points":10,"tags":"[]","metadata":"{\"sourceSection\":\"\",\"keywordsCovered\":\"[\\\"高吞吐量和低延迟\\\",\\\"容错性\\\",\\\"成本效益\\\"]\",\"estimatedTime\":60}"}

{"id":"q_1753504402257_3","type":"multiple_choice","question":"Facebook每周上传的新照片数据量大约是多少？","options":"[\"60GB\",\"60TB\",\"20PB\",\"1TB\"]","correctAnswer":"60TB","explanation":"文档中提到，用户每周上传约60TB的新照片数据。","difficulty":3,"points":10,"tags":"[]","metadata":"{\"sourceSection\":\"\",\"keywordsCovered\":\"[]\",\"estimatedTime\":60}"}

{"id":"q_1753504402257_4","type":"true_false","question":"Haystack存储系统通过将所有元数据存储在主内存中来减少磁盘操作。","options":"[]","correctAnswer":"true","explanation":"文档中明确指出，Haystack通过将所有元数据存储在主内存中来减少磁盘操作，从而提高整体吞吐量。","difficulty":3,"points":10,"tags":"[]","metadata":"{\"sourceSection\":\"\",\"keywordsCovered\":\"[]\",\"estimatedTime\":60}"}
